tldr: This module allows converting any entity form into a simple multi-step form. It fails to properly sanitize certain user-supplied text, leading to a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. Exploitation of this issue is limited to users with the “administer node form display” permission.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `drupal/simple_multistep` library to the patch version.
